name: ChordWhisperer
0:
”Alexa Open Chord Whisperer”
”Alexa tell Chord Whisperer to list F minor 7”
”List B flat minor seven”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: chord whisperer
des: Trying to learn what notes are in those fancy jazz chords? Chord Whisper can be your practice buddy. You can tell Chord Whisperer to list the notes in the following chords: major, minor, 7, minor 7, minor 7 flat 5, 9, minor 9, 7 flat 9, augmented, and augmented 7.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
